Es una aplicación que permite a grupos d: It is an application that allows hospitality groups to have all their information in a single, always-updated place. With DIGINI, users can efficiently and seamlessly manage their menus, inventories, orders, and payments.
La Pizzetta es una pizzería artesanal qu: La Pizzetta is an artisanal pizzeria that uses fresh and high-quality ingredients to create their delicious pizzas. With a crunchy and flavorful crust and a wide variety of toppings, La Pizzetta is the perfect place to enjoy an authentic Italian pizza.
Sushi Saki es un restaurante de sushi qu: Sushi Saki is a sushi restaurant that offers a wide variety of sushi rolls and sashimi, prepared with fresh and high-quality ingredients. From classic tuna and avocado rolls to more innovative options like lobster and asparagus rolls, Sushi Saki has something for everyone's taste.
Brunch and munch es un restaurante de br: Brunch and Munch is a brunch restaurant that offers a wide variety of options to satisfy every taste. From classic eggs benedict and Belgian waffles to more creative options like avocado toasts and breakfast burritos, Brunch and Munch is the perfect place to start your day with energy.
We are open every day from 12:00 to 23:00.
